”The last time they pull something like this I wound up in a mental hospital”

The Twitter Pedo Hunter / Loli Crusader Community -

  • Forums

FishMonster

I have spoken
kiwifarms.net
Dec 24, 2019
  • Highlight
  • #1
Alright so before you guys comment “pedo” or “loli fag” I just want to say I am in no way, at all a pedo or support pedophillia. My point of this thread is to point out an obsessive group of faggots who have their morals and priorities mixed up with the likes of false outrage and petty actions. You may wonder what I’m talking about or may know exactly to what I’m referring to, regardless I will cover these subjects in this post.

I think most people here know that Twitter is a special form of re.tardation and has only increased ever since Trump got elected and Tumblr banned porn. This has caused Twitter to be full of far left lunatics(and right wing) as well as many, many troons. This was always a problem with Twitter but nowadays seems to be 75% of the user base.

So why am I bugged by people calling out pedos? Seems like with all the stupid B.S. they complain about that this seems like a noble and well meaning cause right?

While I hate pedos as much as the next guy and do appreciate the reason for their intentions these people waste their energy harassing anime fans on stupid stuff such as people liking teenage anime girls.

Most people who like teenage anime girls are either teens themselves or people in their 20s, but OH THAT IS A NO NO. Forget there are actual pedos online who are trying to lure in young girls, we must focus on people who are attracted to an anime character.




This is only one example of the many

The debate about loli is a long and stupid one but tbh I rather have creepy people lusting over cartoon girls over creepy people actually lusting over images of real exploited minors. But again, in most of these cases, these people are often teens themselves or in their 20s, I don’t really often see people 30 and over talking about teenage anime girls.

These “noble” people aren’t only annoying though, half of the time these people only seem to do it to cover up the skeletons in their own closets, there are many times when these rabid “pedo hunters” who call people pedos for liking anime girls are pedos themselves.



To make matters worse, a lot of these anti anime girl lewders often support REAL teens and kids being trans. Which is something that can do actual harm to young people psychically and psychologically. Not to mention that a lot of these “trans teens” are often groomed to be trans by weird adults on Discord and Reddit.

Proof of obsessive pedo hunters being pro trans kids:



Although 18 is the legal age most places in the world, these people can’t stand the fact of you sexualize girls who are of legal age. People even get crap if they like legal girls with flat chest.

Example of guy who likes legal age anime girl getting crap(first reply if guy harassing him is deleted from Twitter):


For more examples of this, look up the Nejire shadow drama from My Hero Academia fans. A bunch of these crusaders were calling people pedo for liking Nejire Hado who is an 18 year old girl.

These people are so dumb to the point of throwing the word pedo around for simply sexualizing anything, which may show partly that this “pedo hunting” stuff is just a Trojan Horse for good old fashion “Don’t sexualize women” culture from regular SJWs.

Example (this Pokémon character is supposed to be in her 50s or 60s):


There is a whole other part of this too where these people try harassing Japanese artists, only making westerners look more annoying to the Japanese.

What caused me to make this thread, the tipping point is the Billie Ellish crap. Look I get she just turned 18, and it may be somewhat creepy that people are jumping onboard the fap train right when she became legal, but tbh, so freaking what? She’s legal now, there is nothing legally wrong with it, he’ll not even morally tbh. There has been massive Twitter outrage about it the past couple days and it has been absolutely stupid. Why can’t you guys be happy people are sexualizing her now and not when younger? At least a bunch of horny niggers waited till she was of age. Meanwhile we have actual pedo content on YouTube like young girls doing lewd poses and no one talks about that enough.

Here’s a gold example of some roastie making crap up to start outrage and get attention:


Even PornHub themselves call her out:


That is all I have for now, sorry if this post is badly formatted I have never made an opening post before.

Let me know if there is anything I can add or improve on with this post.

I created this overall to be a discussion of this annoying Twitter community, so feel free to add anything you find.
 
Last edited by a moderator: Dec 25, 2019

Syaoran Li

White Trash Degenerate
True & Honest Fan
kiwifarms.net
Dec 24, 2019
  • Highlight
  • #8
I admit the thread is all over the place and could use more concise focus, but there is potential in this thread. I hate pedos but from what I can tell, this thread isn't so much about people who are anti-pedophilia, but rather SJW virtue-signalers who simply shout "Pedo!" to attack any "problematic" material they don't like, sort of like when SJW's sperg about so-called "Nazis" even when it's not relevant to whatever they're complaining about.

A lot of people tend to get downright A-Loggy when it comes to anime artwork and even if said anime character is only vaguely "sexy" or the character is clearly an adult (like the Pokemon character who is obviously an older woman) these are the kind of people who will throw "Pedo" out as an insult even when the insult doesn't make sense.

I'm not a fan of loli but not all anime is loli.

Of course, you've also got the troll-shielders/male feminist types like Dr. Pizza and the guy from the UN, which the OP did point out.

Work on your OP, and this could have potential. I might drop the part about Billie Ellish and the PornHub tweets, since she's a real person, Mind Geek is a notoriously shady company, and the debate over her doesn't really sync up very well with the rest of your points. It feels tacked on, to be honest.

Everything else has potential.

School of Fish

kiwifarms.net
Dec 24, 2019
  • Highlight
  • #20
This stupid shit pretty much reminds me of what took place on Tumblr a long time ago.

So long before Twitter became a cesspool of self-righteous dipshits, there was Tumblr which was the social media platform for fandoms at its peak.

Well I can't believe that I have to bring up this story after all these years but this is the story of Pinkiepony (aka Pinkie Posh) and the stupid shitstorm of the drama that was the Princess Molestia blog.

So if you know anything about the Internet in the early 2010's, back then you had the brony fandom in which at the time exploded in popularity after the huge success that was 'My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic'. This show got so popular that it was everywhere and you really couldn't escape from it at the time too.

So naturally like a lot of things, the show 'My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic' would gain a lot of attention from a lot of Rule 34 artists and one of those many projects that spawned from this was a Tumblr blog called 'Princess Molestia'.

Now 'Princess Molestia' was a blog that featured the character 'Princess Celestia' from the hit T.V. series and looking at the remaining screenshots it just seemed like softcore porn at best where the character would speak to the reader in a lewd manner while making some suggestive poses too. For a while this blog gotten some popularity that is until this person named 'Pinkiepony' started one of the dumbest online moral crusades ever.

So Pinkiepony decided to go to war against the Princess Molestia Tumblr blog where she claimed that the blog 'promoted sexism' and how content such as this 'demeaned' women everywhere. The drama would get so bad that it would eventually gain the attention from Hasbro in which they decided to send a 'Cease and Desist' letter to the people that ran the Princess Molestia blog and the Tumblr blog then taken down for good. So after all of this, here is where Pinkiepony got her insignificant victory but this left a lot of people really pissed off that she did all of this to begin with.

However, this story does not end here. It would then turn out that the real reason why Pinkiepony wanted the Princess Molestia blog down wasn't because of any of the dumb social justice bullshit that she wanted to push; the real reason why Pinkiepony wanted the blog gone was because she then found her little sister looking at it and wanted her little sister to not look at the NSFW blog anymore and so Pinkiepony then started all of this really dumb social justice crusade because she was too fucking lazy to be the big sister and stuff. To add more insult to injury, people would then also discover that Pinkiepony has also once drew lesbian MLP porn and other pornographic art too and a lot of people did called her out on this in which she would then have a total nuclear meltdown in the aftermath.

So the people that were just having fun and didn't really hurt anyone got screwed over in the end all because someone was too incompetent and lazy to set up an Internet filter that allows people to blacklist said websites from being accessed so there you have it.

So what's the moral of this story? The people that project and bitch about these sorts of things a lot almost always turn out to be total hypocrites and also bigger pieces of shit themselves.

Besides, it shouldn't be that surprising to see Twitter being the cesspool that it is now.

With Tumblr now dead and irrelevant, I can only hope that Twitter suffers the same fate too.

Also I didn’t know how people would take this because it is a touchy subject, I was trying as much as I could to be clear on my points without anyone getting the wrong idea of what I’m trying to say. * Reactions: The Demon Pimp of Razgriz, PururinSenpai, Fuckinkek666 and 18 others [ ](/members/school-of-fish.34411/) [School of Fish](/members/school-of-fish.34411/) kiwifarms.net [ Dec 24, 2019 ](/threads/the-twitter-pedo-hunter-loli-crusader-community.64404/post-5765737) * [](#post-5765587) * Highlight * [ ](/threads/the-twitter-pedo-hunter-loli-crusader-community.64404/post-5765737) * [ #20 ](/threads/the-twitter-pedo-hunter-loli-crusader-community.64404/post-5765737) This stupid shit pretty much reminds me of what took place on Tumblr a long time ago. So long before Twitter became a cesspool of self-righteous dipshits, there was Tumblr which was the social media platform for fandoms at its peak. Well I can't believe that I have to bring up this story after all these years but this is the story of Pinkiepony (aka Pinkie Posh) and the stupid shitstorm of the drama that was the Princess Molestia blog. So if you know anything about the Internet in the early 2010's, back then you had the brony fandom in which at the time exploded in popularity after the huge success that was 'My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic'. This show got so popular that it was everywhere and you really couldn't escape from it at the time too. So naturally like a lot of things, the show 'My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic' would gain a lot of attention from a lot of Rule 34 artists and one of those many projects that spawned from this was a Tumblr blog called 'Princess Molestia'. Now 'Princess Molestia' was a blog that featured the character 'Princess Celestia' from the hit T.V. series and looking at the remaining screenshots it just seemed like softcore porn at best where the character would speak to the reader in a lewd manner while making some suggestive poses too. For a while this blog gotten some popularity that is until this person named 'Pinkiepony' started one of the dumbest online moral crusades ever. So Pinkiepony decided to go to war against the Princess Molestia Tumblr blog where she claimed that the blog 'promoted sexism' and how content such as this 'demeaned' women everywhere. The drama would get so bad that it would eventually gain the attention from Hasbro in which they decided to send a 'Cease and Desist' letter to the people that ran the Princess Molestia blog and the Tumblr blog then taken down for good. So after all of this, here is where Pinkiepony got her insignificant victory but this left a lot of people really pissed off that she did all of this to begin with. However, this story does not end here. It would then turn out that the real reason why Pinkiepony wanted the Princess Molestia blog down wasn't because of any of the dumb social justice bullshit that she wanted to push; the real reason why Pinkiepony wanted the blog gone was because she then found her little sister looking at it and wanted her little sister to not look at the NSFW blog anymore and so Pinkiepony then started all of this really dumb social justice crusade because she was too fucking lazy to be the big sister and stuff. To add more insult to injury, people would then also discover that Pinkiepony has also once drew lesbian MLP porn and other pornographic art too and a lot of people did called her out on this in which she would then have a total nuclear meltdown in the aftermath. So the people that were just having fun and didn't really hurt anyone got screwed over in the end all because someone was too incompetent and lazy to set up an Internet filter that allows people to blacklist said websites from being accessed so there you have it. So what's the moral of this story? The people that project and bitch about these sorts of things a lot almost always turn out to be total hypocrites and also bigger pieces of shit themselves. Besides, it shouldn't be that surprising to see Twitter being the cesspool that it is now. With Tumblr now dead and irrelevant, I can only hope that Twitter suffers the same fate too. post_text.surface_form: Alright so before you guys comment “pedo” or “loli fag” I just want to say I am in no way, at all a pedo or support pedophillia. My point of this thread is to point out an obsessive group of faggots who have their morals and priorities mixed up with the likes of false outrage and petty actions. You may wonder what I’m talking about or may know exactly to what I’m referring to, regardless I will cover these subjects in this post. I think most people here know that Twitter is a special form of re.tardation and has only increased ever since Trump got elected and Tumblr banned porn. This has caused Twitter to be full of far left lunatics(and right wing) as well as many, many troons. This was always a problem with Twitter but nowadays seems to be 75% of the user base. So why am I bugged by people calling out pedos? Seems like with all the stupid B.S. they complain about that this seems like a noble and well meaning cause right? While I hate pedos as much as the next guy and do appreciate the reason for their intentions these people waste their energy harassing anime fans on stupid stuff such as people liking teenage anime girls. Most people who like teenage anime girls are either teens themselves or people in their 20s, but OH THAT IS A NO NO. Forget there are actual pedos online who are trying to lure in young girls, we must focus on people who are attracted to an anime character.  This is only one example of the many The debate about loli is a long and stupid one but tbh I rather have creepy people lusting over cartoon girls over creepy people actually lusting over images of real exploited minors. But again, in most of these cases, these people are often teens themselves or in their 20s, I don’t really often see people 30 and over talking about teenage anime girls. These “noble” people aren’t only annoying though, half of the time these people only seem to do it to cover up the skeletons in their own closets, there are many times when these rabid “pedo hunters” who call people pedos for liking anime girls are pedos themselves.  To make matters worse, a lot of these anti anime girl lewders often support REAL teens and kids being trans. Which is something that can do actual harm to young people psychically and psychologically. Not to mention that a lot of these “trans teens” are often groomed to be trans by weird adults on Discord and Reddit. Proof of obsessive pedo hunters being pro trans kids:  Although 18 is the legal age most places in the world, these people can’t stand the fact of you sexualize girls who are of legal age. People even get crap if they like legal girls with flat chest. Example of guy who likes legal age anime girl getting crap(first reply if guy harassing him is deleted from Twitter):  For more examples of this, look up the Nejire shadow drama from My Hero Academia fans. A bunch of these crusaders were calling people pedo for liking Nejire Hado who is an 18 year old girl. These people are so dumb to the point of throwing the word pedo around for simply sexualizing anything, which may show partly that this “pedo hunting” stuff is just a Trojan Horse for good old fashion “Don’t sexualize women” culture from regular SJWs. Example (this Pokémon character is supposed to be in her 50s or 60s):  There is a whole other part of this too where these people try harassing Japanese artists, only making westerners look more annoying to the Japanese. What caused me to make this thread, the tipping point is the Billie Ellish crap. Look I get she just turned 18, and it may be somewhat creepy that people are jumping onboard the fap train right when she became legal, but tbh, so freaking what? She’s legal now, there is nothing legally wrong with it, he’ll not even morally tbh. There has been massive Twitter outrage about it the past couple days and it has been absolutely stupid. Why can’t you guys be happy people are sexualizing her now and not when younger? At least a bunch of horny niggers waited till she was of age. Meanwhile we have actual pedo content on YouTube like young girls doing lewd poses and no one talks about that enough. Here’s a gold example of some roastie making crap up to start outrage and get attention:  Even PornHub themselves call her out:  That is all I have for now, sorry if this post is badly formatted I have never made an opening post before. Let me know if there is anything I can add or improve on with this post. I created this overall to be a discussion of this annoying Twitter community, so feel free to add anything you find.
> rabid pedo hunters > tweet examples Not shitting on your street, just amazed at how simply tweets are enough to judge who is a sperg. Call me old-fashioned.

I admit the thread is all over the place and could use more concise focus, but there is potential in this thread. I hate pedos but from what I can tell, this thread isn't so much about people who are anti-pedophilia, but rather SJW virtue-signalers who simply shout "Pedo!" to attack any "problematic" material they don't like, sort of like when SJW's sperg about so-called "Nazis" even when it's not relevant to whatever they're complaining about. A lot of people tend to get downright A-Loggy when it comes to anime artwork and even if said anime character is only vaguely "sexy" or the character is clearly an adult (like the Pokemon character who is obviously an older woman) these are the kind of people who will throw "Pedo" out as an insult even when the insult doesn't make sense. I'm not a fan of loli but not all anime is loli. Of course, you've also got the troll-shielders/male feminist types like Dr. Pizza and the guy from the UN, which the OP did point out. Work on your OP, and this could have potential. I might drop the part about Billie Ellish and the PornHub tweets, since she's a real person, Mind Geek is a notoriously shady company, and the debate over her doesn't really sync up very well with the rest of your points. It feels tacked on, to be honest. Everything else has potential.

This stupid shit pretty much reminds me of what took place on Tumblr a long time ago. So long before Twitter became a cesspool of self-righteous dipshits, there was Tumblr which was the social media platform for fandoms at its peak. Well I can't believe that I have to bring up this story after all these years but this is the story of Pinkiepony (aka Pinkie Posh) and the stupid shitstorm of the drama that was the Princess Molestia blog. So if you know anything about the Internet in the early 2010's, back then you had the brony fandom in which at the time exploded in popularity after the huge success that was 'My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic'. This show got so popular that it was everywhere and you really couldn't escape from it at the time too. So naturally like a lot of things, the show 'My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic' would gain a lot of attention from a lot of Rule 34 artists and one of those many projects that spawned from this was a Tumblr blog called 'Princess Molestia'. Now 'Princess Molestia' was a blog that featured the character 'Princess Celestia' from the hit T.V. series and looking at the remaining screenshots it just seemed like softcore porn at best where the character would speak to the reader in a lewd manner while making some suggestive poses too. For a while this blog gotten some popularity that is until this person named 'Pinkiepony' started one of the dumbest online moral crusades ever. So Pinkiepony decided to go to war against the Princess Molestia Tumblr blog where she claimed that the blog 'promoted sexism' and how content such as this 'demeaned' women everywhere. The drama would get so bad that it would eventually gain the attention from Hasbro in which they decided to send a 'Cease and Desist' letter to the people that ran the Princess Molestia blog and the Tumblr blog then taken down for good. So after all of this, here is where Pinkiepony got her insignificant victory but this left a lot of people really pissed off that she did all of this to begin with. However, this story does not end here. It would then turn out that the real reason why Pinkiepony wanted the Princess Molestia blog down wasn't because of any of the dumb social justice bullshit that she wanted to push; the real reason why Pinkiepony wanted the blog gone was because she then found her little sister looking at it and wanted her little sister to not look at the NSFW blog anymore and so Pinkiepony then started all of this really dumb social justice crusade because she was too fucking lazy to be the big sister and stuff. To add more insult to injury, people would then also discover that Pinkiepony has also once drew lesbian MLP porn and other pornographic art too and a lot of people did called her out on this in which she would then have a total nuclear meltdown in the aftermath. So the people that were just having fun and didn't really hurt anyone got screwed over in the end all because someone was too incompetent and lazy to set up an Internet filter that allows people to blacklist said websites from being accessed so there you have it. So what's the moral of this story? The people that project and bitch about these sorts of things a lot almost always turn out to be total hypocrites and also bigger pieces of shit themselves. Besides, it shouldn't be that surprising to see Twitter being the cesspool that it is now. With Tumblr now dead and irrelevant, I can only hope that Twitter suffers the same fate too.
